mapper.delete: update booking set booking_yn = 'y', booking_bookingstate = '예약취소', booking_depositstate = '반환완료(예약취소)' where booking_num = #{bookingNum};
mapper.update: update booking set booking_depositstate = #{bookingDepositstate} where booking_num = #{bookingNum};
update booking set booking_bookingstate ="대여중" where booking_date = DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y-%m-%d');
update booking set booking_bookingstate ="기간만료" where DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y-%m-%d') > booking_date
update booking set review_count = review_count + 1 where booking_num = #{bookingNum};
